trans-unit.source: Represents a single-row update operation expressed as a command tree.
trans-unit.target: 명령 트리로 표현 된 단일 행 업데이트 작업을 나타냅니다.
이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A> property is set, the command returns a reader; otherwise, it returns a scalar value indicating the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>속성이 설정 되어 있으면 판독기를 반환 하는 명령; 그렇지 않으면 영향을 받는 행 수를 나타내는 스칼라 값을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> 업데이트할 대상 컬렉션의 멤버를 결정 하는 데 사용 되는 조건자를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The predicate can include only the following elements: a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression> representing equality; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression> that references the target; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 조건자는 다음 요소만 포함 될 수 있습니다: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>나타내는 같음; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>;는 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression>target;를 참조 하는 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> 업데이트할 대상 컬렉션의 멤버를 결정 하는 데 사용 되는 조건자를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned, based on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> 반환 될 결과의 프로젝션을 지정 하는 수정 된 행을 기반으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The returning projection includes only the following elements: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.
An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned based, on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> 수정된 된 행에 따라 반환 될 결과의 프로젝션을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> indicates that no results should be returned from this command.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>이 명령에서 결과 반환 해야 됨을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트의 목록을 업데이트 작업을 정의 하는 set 절을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 목록이 업데이트 작업을 정의 하는 절을 설정 합니다.
